meanings.definition: A list of items or tasks to be completed by hand.
meanings.sent1: She wrote down the handlists of groceries to buy at the store.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a handlist of chores to do on the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The handlists of errands seemed to grow longer every day.
meanings.sent4: Her handlist of recipes was like a treasure map to delicious meals.
meanings.sent5: The handlist of ingredients for the cake made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A list of references or sources compiled by hand.
meanings.sent1: The student meticulously created a handlist of books for the research paper.
meanings.sent2: The librarian showed me the handlist of recommended novels.
meanings.sent3: His handlist of favorite authors was a mix of classics and modern writers.
meanings.sent4: The handlist of historical documents was a valuable resource for the project.
meanings.sent5: She kept a handlist of websites for quick reference during her studies.
